Package ohos.agp.components

Interface AttrSet


  • public interface AttrSet
    Defines how to store, read, and use attributes related to Component controls, as well as other classes that need to use the attribute set.
    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String STYLE_ATTR
      Defines the style of the attributes in an attribute set.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Optional<Attr> getAttr​(int index)
      Obtains an attribute using its index.
      Optional<Attr> getAttr​(String fullName)
      Obtains an attribute by its name.
      int getLength​()
      Obtains the quantity of attributes in the attribute set.
      Optional<String> getStyle​()
      Obtains the attribute style.

    • Field Detail

      • STYLE_ATTR

        static final String STYLE_ATTR
        Defines the style of the attributes in an attribute set.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getStyle

        Optional<String> getStyle​()
        Obtains the attribute style.
        Returns:
        Returns the attribute style.

      • getLength

        int getLength​()
        Obtains the quantity of attributes in the attribute set.
        Returns:
        Returns the quantity of attributes.

      • getAttr

        Optional<Attr> getAttr​(int index)
        Obtains an attribute using its index.
        Parameters:
        index - Indicates the index value ranging from 0 to the quantity of existing attributes minus 1. A value outside of this range will not generate an error, but will receive an empty Optional object.
        Returns:
        Returns the attribute corresponding to the index.

      • getAttr

        Optional<Attr> getAttr​(String fullName)
        Obtains an attribute by its name.

        An attribute that matches fullName will be returned.

        Parameters:
        fullName - Indicates the fully qualified name of the attribute.
        Returns:
        Returns a matching attribute.
